emergency_rerouting.title: Backup Systems Activation
emergency_rerouting.description: Maya pulls up secondary route maps: 'We can reroute through the old atmospheric channels and some moon-eel tunnel systems. It'll be slower and less reliable, but it'll keep goods moving. The real problem is power - the backup systems weren't designed for full network load. We'll have rolling brownouts across half the archipelago.'

choices.text: 'Rolling brownouts are better than complete isolation.'
'Can we prioritize critical routes and services?'
'We need to fix the primary systems instead of working around them.'
'This is a temporary solution - what's the long-term plan?'
